title: Minuteman Missile National Historic Site: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions              Current Conditions          Alerts    Information        Delta-01 Tour Tickets  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Delta-01 Tour Tickets  During the busy summer season, the first come, first serve tickets for Delta-01 tours often go very quickly. We strongly advise visitors desiring a tour to be at the visitor center when it opens at 8:00 a.m. to increase your chances of getting a tour.                Minuteman Missile National Historic Site is Open  Minuteman Missile National Historic Site is open year-round. For more information, visit the links below, or go to our Plan Your Visit section.         Visitor Services The Minuteman Missile Visitor Center is open year-round. Tours of the Delta-01 Launch Control Facility are available daily; schedule varies seasonally. For more information please visit our Operating Hours and Seasons page.         Weather The weather in western South Dakota can change quickly and is highly unpredictable. Be prepared and check the forecast before traveling. Visit our Weather page to know what to expect before your visit.         Latest News Visit the News Release page for up-to-date park news. Connect with Minuteman Missile through our social media sites on Facebook and Twitter.
